def compute_totals(revenue, costs, tax_rate): 
   profit_before_tax = revenue - costs 
   tax = profit_before_tax * tax_rate 
   net_profit = profit_before_tax - tax 
   return net_profit

costs = 50000 
tax_rate = 0.3 
net_profit = compute_totals(revenue, costs, tax_rate)",
